Summary: A bar like shadow reaching from horizon to horizon from N-NE to S-S W traviling in a S-SE direction at a rapid rate of speed.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Crystal
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsOn either Oct. 15 or Nov. 15 2010 sometime between 1:00-2:15 AM.. Both my son and myself observed a shadow cast upon broken clouds. This shadow appeared to be about 25'-50' in width from the ground. Stretching horizon to horizon,from NNE-SSW. When I first saw it was not moving , but after pointing out the phenomena to my son it started moving rapidly in south by south-easterly direction. There were also contrails in the area all of which seemed to be stationary. The clouds were moving mostly in an easterly direction, with a ceiling above thirty-five thousand feet. While watching the shadow there was a brake in the clouds where the moon was visible, but there was no sign of what was causing the shadow.The next day I called N.O.A.A. to find out if any one else had seen it, or weather or not they knew what was. They told me that it was a contrail. Being that I spent 10yrs. in the Air Force, along being an avid sky watcher I knew better. Contrails don't move any thing like that this thing did.
